description: Classic mountain tours, via ferrata and much more: The Kento Tour High GTX® Men impresses as a mountaineering boot with outstanding grip and minimum weight thanks to a sole design developed specially by Mammut and Vibram. Mastrotto split leather stands for "Made in Italy" sustainability. The Gore-Tex membrane makes the shoe waterproof and breathable, while the improved last design promises an optimum fit. A technical mountaineering boot for performance-oriented adventures.
name: Mammut Kento Tour High GTX - Mens

specs.value: Blend of supple inner and tough outer materials for enhanced comfort and good adaptability.
Individual 2-zone lacing. Can be adjusted to person and situation
Reinforced, flexible inside prevents you from twisting your ankle while maintaining full freedom of movement
